General.Name: Juli Sling Co Ltd
General.Description: Juli Sling Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells rigging products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers synthetic fiber slings, steel wire ropes, steel wire slings, chain slings, steel tie rods, cable slings, metallurgical fixtures, beam slings, rigging connectors, rigging manufacturing equipment, heat, etc., as well as forging rigging, and clamp and beams. The company's products are used in mining, construction, transportation, steel, metallurgy, mining, ocean, maritime, offshore oil, electric power, petroleum, transportation, bridges, venues, aerospace, ports, shipbuilding, construction machinery, and other fields. Juli Sling Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Baoding, the People's Republic of China.
